title: A Very Upset Customer.
body:
Dear Riot,

I'd like to send you this message on behalf of my brother and i who are deeply upset.

Let me start by saying; 3months ago, my brother and i had a conversation about time off work and holidaying and when we could book it. We both agree'd that we'd book our time off starting April 1st, purely based on our excitement and anticipation of the release of URF. To us, who don't get much time in our busy days to play League, this was perfect. You've utterly ruined our plans for the next week and we're left without anything to do but share our disgust and disappointment via Skype.

I really hope you can justify this lack of URF with something better than an idiotic Draven bobble-head in-game feature.

Sincerely,
Michael (aka Tysius)

replies.body: They already said that were was going to be no URF.
Yes but they said that about a month ago. This guy booked 3 months ago if you read.

As Rocka said, RIOT has already stated that U.R.F. isn't returning for April Fools. But to make up for it, they are going to be releasing it twice through 2016.

> We’re announcing it now is because two years in a row, we delivered the Ultra Rapid Fire game mode in increasingly absurd ways. While we’re pretty sure you aren’t going to believe us anyway, we’re telling you right now that URF will not return on the first of April.

> We are ready to share that Ultra Rapid Fire will appear at least twice in 2016.

If you want to read the full post, [Click Here](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/gameplay/announcing-rotating-game-mode-queue)

But that post, when considered in contrast to last years, and then the lead up with Draven day stuff on S@20, sounded like their usual jokes. Sure no one expected it yesterday (April Fools Guys, no URF). BUUUT today, April 2nd, its no longer April fools, jokes over, give URF back its rightful time, WITH VENGEANCE.

So you expect RIOT to joke about it not being up for around April fools. 

All things need to go through testing before it comes to the live servers. With the new rotating game mode queue being tested currently, RIOT didn't have enough time to also test U.R.F. for any bugs with new items / champions.

Just be patient, it will come out eventually. I'm sure people don't want to play a game mode that is broken. It could be unplayable for all we know.
While I am just as upset as you, because I too am frantically awaiting URF, in RIOT's defense, they did make an announcement that URF would not be released today, a few weeks in advance too.

I dont think they quite understand the implication when they posted that. Every year before releasing urf they "claimed" not to be releasing it. People just assumed it was another part of Rito's devious plans to try and "trick" us into thinking it wasn't going to come out, which is WHY so many people anticipated it.
But i guess Rito got us this time... jokes on us guys :( {{item:3070}}
